## mutation() function

Use a custom mutation to define an API request that will modify backend data or trigger a subscription event.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function mutation(): CustomOperation<{
    arguments: null;
    returnType: null;
    authorization: [];
    typeName: 'Mutation';
    handlers: null;
}, 'for', typeof mutationBrand>;
```

a custom mutation
